revised_title: Lepidodendron Harcourtii and L. fuliginosum: A Reexamination of Fossil Plant Species
tldr: The author examines and reclassifies two species of fossil plants, Lepidodendron Harcourtii and L. fuliginosum, based on their anatomical and structural differences. They provide evidence from specimens and historical records to support their classification, which helps clarify the taxonomy of these ancient plant species.
